programme.title: Khanka (Ep19)
programme.desc: Crime, Drama, Thriller 2016 A teacher has been sexually harassed by one of her students. She decides to sue him. but as the student is the son of a state official standing against him in court, she finds herself accused of mental disorder. Ghada Abdel Razek, Maged El Masry, Fathy Abd Alwahab, Carolin Khalil, Ahmed Abd El Wareth, Mohamed Gom`aa, Mahmoud Desouqy

programme.title: Tambourines (Ep20)
programme.desc: People, Drama 2021 Complex confrontations and interrelated relationships between members of a folk art group for women and another for men. Mounir Al Zaaby, Hamad Al Roomi, Huda Hussien, Ebrahim Alhasawi, Khaled Albriky, Shima`a Aly, Rawan Mahdi

programme.title: Taj (Ep14)
programme.desc: Action, Romance, Drama, History, Thriller 2024 In the midst of Syria's French mandate, boxer Taj fights not just in the ring, but against accusations of treason from within the resistance, leading him on a gripping journey to prove his loyalty and innocence. Taym Hassan, Bassam Kousa, Dogana Isa, Farah Al Dabiyat, Noura Rahhal, Samer Al Barqawi, Omar Abu Saada, Taim Hasan, Bassam Kouss, Dogana Essa, Farah Al Dbayyat, Nora Rahal, Faia Younan

programme.title: No Roaming (Ep6)
programme.desc: Comedy, People 2021 In a comic context, the unwanted effects of the Coronavirus on Saudi and Gulf society, and the many preventive measures and precautions. Nasser Al-Qasabi, Rashed Al Shamrani, Fayez Almalky, Habeeb Al Habeeb, Abdel Majeed Al Rohedy, Khalaf Al Harbi, Amany Al Salimi, Aws El Sharqy

programme.title: Katha Ankahee (Ep84)
programme.desc: Drama, Family, Thriller, Bollywood 2022 While seeking money for her child's healthcare needs, Katha is in trouble after Viaan's offer to help her. Aditi Sharma, Adnan Khan, Azinkya Mishra, Samar Vermani, Jasveenn Kaur, Ravi Bhushan

programme.title: Ayyoub (Ep8)
programme.desc: People, Drama 2018 In a bid to improve his life, a modest young man strives to handle multiple jobs, but his friends and relatives throw him in prison. He loses his mother after that, which leads him to take revenge. Mostafa Shabaan, Ayten Amer, Mohamed Lotfy, Hannah El Zahed, Mirhan Hussein, Ahmad Saleh, Mohamed Sayyed Basheer

programme.title: The Queen (Ep29)
programme.desc: Drama 2023 Fame, fortune, and love, Ates, one of the country's most iconic basketball players, and his wife Deniz had it all, until a devastating scandal shattered their perfect world. Cevdet Mercan, Serhan Sahin, Ava DuVernay, Burcu Özberk, Gokhan Alkan, Selin Sekerci

programme.title: The Agent Of Love (Ep19)
programme.desc: Romance, Drama, Thriller 2023 Circumstances bring together the young and hardworking intelligence agent Onur and Ege, a professional thief, and a love story develops between them. Sukru Ozyildiz, Tuğrul Tülek, Burcu Özberk, Asli Smen, Sehsuvar Aktas, Aytac Cicek, Cenk Bogatur

programme.title: Golden Boy (Ep35)
programme.desc: Romance, Drama 2022 Fareed is a reckless young man who prompts his grandfather to force him to marry, thinking he will learn to take responsibility. His family chooses Seyran, whose life will change completely. Afra Saraçoglu, Mert Ramazan Demir, Gülçin Santircioglu, Emre Altug, Beril Pozam, Burcu Alptekin, Gulseren Budayicioglu

programme.title: The Game: Playing With Seniors (Ep9)
programme.desc: Comedy, Drama 2022 It seems almost impossible for Mazu and Wassim to stop challenging each other despite the difficulties they encountered in the previous game rounds. Hesham Majed, Shiko, Mai Kassab, Mirna Gamil, Mohammad Tharwat, Ahmed Fathy, Moataz Al Tony, Ahmed Saad Wali

programme.title: The Game: Playing With Seniors (Ep10)
programme.desc: Comedy, Drama 2022 It seems almost impossible for Mazu and Wassim to stop challenging each other despite the difficulties they encountered in the previous game rounds. Hesham Majed, Shiko, Mai Kassab, Mirna Gamil, Mohammad Tharwat, Ahmed Fathy, Moataz Al Tony, Ahmed Saad Wali

programme.title: Apple Of Your Eyes (Ep12)
programme.desc: Comedy, People, Drama 2023 Kaltham's innocence appears after 25 years in jail, and she gets released from prison, but she is shocked to be rejected by her daughters and society overall. Hayat Al Fahad, Soaad Ali, Shimaa Aly, Buthaina Al Raisi, Reem Abdullah, Abdulaziz Al Nassaar, Seod Bo Ebid, Ali Shams

programme.title: Genius (Ep136)
programme.desc: People, Drama, Family 2024 Mathematics prodigy Devran comes face-to-face with the father who abandoned them years ago, just as he prepares to leave the country. Old wounds resurface, reigniting his thirst for revenge and escalating the battle between good and evil. Umut Aral, Damla Serim, Aras Bulut Iynemli, Ugur Polat, Taner Ölmez, Onur Saylak, Melis Sezen, Taner Olmez

programme.title: What If You Love Too Much (Ep35)
programme.desc: Romance, Drama 2023 Ates is forced return to his hometown of Istanbul and carry out the will of his recently deceased father, while Leyla is a manipulative girl whose goal is to find her family. The two's paths cross in an unfathomable way that neither can fully understand. Kerem Bursin, Hafsanur Sancaktutan, Hatice Aslan, Serif Erol, Nazmi Kirik, Ali Bilgin, Ahmet Ruhan Arca

programme.title: A Pencil (Ep11)

programme.title: Twt

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Dydy pwmpenni Maer Oci ddim yn tyfu'n dda iawn, ond mae Blero a'i ffrindiau'n datrys y broblem. Mayor Oci's pumpkins don't seem to be growing - but a few wiggly worms may be able to help!

programme.title: Kim a Cêt a Twrch
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cêt ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am Twrch yn y goedwig. Join Kim and Cêt on a magical and playful adventure.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Mae Odo isie creu arfgraff ar Pen Bandit a Prif Swyddog Plu, ond dyw e ddim cweit yn llwyddo. Odo wants to impress Camp Leader and Inspector Feathers but things don't turn out as he wants.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Huwcyn yn darganfod Crwb-bop ar y traeth! On today's poptastic adventure, Huwcyn find a Crwb-bop on the beach!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw, rydyn ni'n teithio i wlad sy'n ynys o'r enw Madagasgar. Yma byddwn ni'n dysgu ychydig o iaith Malagasi, dysgu am fanila ac ymweld â'r brifddinas Antananarivo. Today: Madagascar!

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae hi'n Ddiwrnod Gwerthfawrogi'r Botiaid, ond mae Jetboi yn awyddus i gael y sylw i gyd! It's Bot Appreciation Day, but Jet-boy wants all the attention!

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd â Deiniol y cocatw, ac Ifan a'i gi. Today we meet Deiniol the cockatoo, and Ifan and his dog.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Pan fo Cwyn-wr yn colli rheolaeth dros ei 'sgidiau sglefrolio mae'r Olobobs yn creu Brenin Jeli i'w helpu i lanio! The Olobobs create King Jelly to provide a soft landing for Groan Up.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd. Yn y rhaglen hon y panda a'r macaw sy'n cael y sylw. In this programme we get to know the panda and the macaw.

programme.title: Y Diwrnod Mawr
programme.desc: Mae Harriet yn paratoi at y sioe geffylau, ond ar y diwrnod mawr, mae ei hoff geffyl Ollie'n sal...Has Harriet's horse's illness dashed her hopes of taking a rosette back home to the farm?

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Dyw Pablo ddim yn deall pam fod dwylo Magi mor ddiddorol. Mae o wir eisiau cyffwrdd croen yr hen wraig ond nid yw'n siwr os y dylai! Today Pablo really wants to feel Magi's wrinkled hands!

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae sbectol Harri wedi torri, ac er i Harri drio ei thrwsio, mae angen iddo gael sbectol newydd. Harri's glasses are broken, although Harri tried to fix them, he needs new glasses.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod glawog, diflas yn y nen heddiw ond yn gyfle da i'r Cymylaubychain hel atgofion am ddiwrnodiau brafiach. It's a wet, miserable day today but remember the happy, better days!

programme.title: Twm Twrch

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae'r Tralalas yn gwybod bod ailgylchu yn beth da i'w wneud ac yn hwyl hefyd! The Tralalas know that recycling is good to do and fun too! Bop recycles something into a puppet!

programme.title: Sam Tân
programme.desc: Mae pengwin ar goll ym Mhontypandy, mae siop Dilys ar dan, ac mae angen Sam Tan a'i griw! A penguin is missing at Pontypandy, Dilys' shop catches fire and Sam Tan and his crew and needed!

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi i blant meithrin sy'n cynnwys sgetsys, eitemau doniol, jôcs a chymeriadau dwl newydd sbon. A comedy show for pre-school children, full of sketches, jokes and fun!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Sam wedi mynd am drip pysgota ac wedi mynd â bocs o lysiau Siôn gydag e mewn camgymeriad! Sut fydd y criw yn datrys hyn tybed? Sam mixes up a box of ice with a box of vegetables!

programme.title: Asra
programme.desc: Bydd plant o Ysgol Cwm Gwyddon, Abercarn yn ymweld ag Asra yr wythnos hon. Children from Ysgol Cwm Gwyddon, Abercarn visit Asra this week.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cyfres animeiddiedig gyda chaneuon a hwiangerddi traddodiadol a chyfoes. Y tro hwn: cân i helpu plant bach ddysgu lliwiau. A traditional nursery song to help children learn about colours.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae baromedr Abel yn dweud y bydd stormydd eira yn ardal Glenys o'r goedwig. Abel's barometer predicts snowstorms in Glenys's neck of the woods.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi, celf a chân i blant 4-7 mlwydd oed lle mae Aeron Pugh fel y cymeriad Bendant yn ymuno â dosbarthiadau plant ledled Cymru. Comedy, art and singing series for children aged 4-7.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mewn cystadleuaeth mae Guto'n profi ei fod yn haeddu bod yn rhan o griw'r wiwerod. Guto proves he's got what it takes to be part of the squirrel tribe.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Ynys Wen sy'n ymuno â Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Ynys Wen join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Cywion Bach
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae ffrindiau'r Cywion Bach yn dangos gair arbennig - haul! Today, the friends of Cywion Bach are showing a special word - haul. Bîp Bîp goes to the beach to play in the sun.

programme.title: Og y Draenog Hapus
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Og a'i ffrindiau heddiw? What's happening in the world of Og and friends today?

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Mae Loli'n joio chwarae gyda'r ffiltyrs ar ffôn newydd ei mam ond mae pethau'n mynd rhy bell wrth iddi fynd i fewn i'r ffôn. Loli steps into the phone while playing with Mum's new filters!

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Mae'r Octonots yn dilyn mamau pengwin ymerodrol sydd ar eu ffordd adref at eu teuluoedd. The Octonauts follow emperor penguin mums returning to their families.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Megan yn cael hwyl yn gwisgo fel archarwr ac yn mynd gyda Hywel y ffermwr hud i ddarganfod mwy am frocoli a sut mae'n cael ei dyfu. Megan finds out more about the superfood broccoli.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Heddiw, byddwn yn dysgu am sut mae'r byd yn troi, beth yw rhewlif a sut mae'n symud, a llawer mwy. Today we discover how different plants grow at different rates, and learn about wind!

programme.title: Sali Mali
programme.desc: Mae Jac Do'n ffotograffydd gwael ac mae ei ffrindiau'n gwneud hwyl am ben ei luniau! 'Dyw e ddim yn hapus am hyn, ond mae Sali Mali yn achub y dydd! Jac Do is upset but SM saves the day!

programme.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur
programme.desc: Mae Cyw, Plwmp a Deryn yn poeni - mae Llew ar goll. Cyw, Plwmp and Deryn are worried - Llew has gone missing. Where did he go? Can Jen and Jim solve the mystery?

programme.title: Patrôl Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae'r cwn yn helpu Ffarmwr Bini paratoi ar gyfer diwrnod ei phriodas ar ôl i storm ddinistrio'r beudy. The Pups help Farmer Bini prepare for her wedding day after a storm destroys the barn.

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: A fydd morladron Ysgol Pont Sion Norton yn llwyddo i helpu Ben Dant a Cadi i drechu Capten Cnec a chipio'r ynys nôl? Can the pirates from Ysgol Pont Sion Norton help Ben Dant and Cadi?

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae'r Tralalas yn mynd ar daith i'r dref - dewch gyda nhw! Mae cymaint i'w weld yn y dref, ac hefyd yn yr awyr! The Tralalas take a tour of the city and would love to ride along with you.

programme.title: Sam Tân
programme.desc: Mae Norman am greu'r syrcas 'fwyaf anghredadwy' erioed, ond fel arfer mae'n rhaid i Sam gamu mewn. Norman creates the 'most unbelievable' circus ever, but as usual it's Sam to the rescue!

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi i blant meithrin sy'n cynnwys sgetsys, eitemau doniol, jôcs a chymeriadau dwl newydd sbon. A comedy show for pre-school children, full of sketches, jokes and fun!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae brain yn bla ar fferm Magi: all dyfais newydd Jac Jôs helpu i gael gwared arnyn nhw? Siôn helps Magi out on the farm by enlisting Jac Jôs' errant drone to deal with a troublesome crow.

programme.title: Asra
programme.desc: Plant o ysgolion cynradd sy'n cystadlu yn y gyfres hwyliog hon lle mae ennill sêr yn golygu ennill pwer. Primary school children compete to win stars in this out of this world series.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cyfres animeddedig gyda chaneuon a hwiangerddi traddodiadol a chyfoes. Cân sy'n ymarfer cyfri i bump yw "5 Crocodeil". "5 Crocodeil" is a song to practice counting to five.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Pan mae Betsi yn bwrw swyn ac yn gwneud i Siriol ddiflannu ar ddamwain, mae Glenys yn cipio Llyfr Swyn. Betsi casts a spell and Glenys takes her chance and grabs Spellbook in the chaos.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Heddiw mae Ben Dant yn ymuno á disgyblion Ysgol Gynradd Gymraeg Garth Olwg i greu trysor penigamp. Ben Dant joins the pupils of Ysgol Dyffryn Trannon, Trefeglwys to create a treasure.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Ar ôl i Guto ddweud celwydd sy'n arwain Dili Minllyn i grafangau Mr Cadno, rhaid iddo geisiau achub ei bywyd! Guto tells a lie which leads Dili Minllyn into the clutches of the sly old fox.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Dyffryn Y Glowyr sy'n ymuno â Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Dyffryn Y Glowyr join Pwdryn and Melys to play some candyland games.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Gwyliau Gartref
programme.desc: Biwmares ar Ynys Môn yw'r lleoliad y tro ma, tref glan môr lle mae dewis eang i siwtio pob poced. Two crews with two different budgets, but who will have the most fun? This time: Beaumaris. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Richard Holt: Yr Academi Felys
programme.desc: Mae'r chwe phobydd yn cwrdd â Rich ym Melin Llynon ac yn cael eu gwers gyntaf yng nghegin yr Academi. The six bakers meet Rich at Melin Llynon and head to the Academy for their first lesson.

programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Y Busnes Bwyd
programme.desc: Mae'r cystadleuwyr sy'n weddill yn teithio i Gonwy am dasg marchnata a chyfryngau cymdeithasol. Contestants work as teams to create a social media advert for the Bodnant Welsh Food centre.

programme.title: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn ffeindio be' ma nhw'n feddwl yw seren goll ar y traeth ac yn ceisio'i dychwelyd i'r awyr. The Woohoos find what they think is a fallen star on the beach and try to return it.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Er bod ei chwiorydd yn gwneud hwyl am ei ben, mae Deio'r hwyaden wrth ei fodd yn darllen llyfrau. Hurrah! Deio the duck finds a new friend who loves books as much as he does.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Pam bod pethau'n arnofio?'. Dyna mae Ela am wybod heddiw. Mae gan Tad-cu stori sili arall i'w rannu am bysgod anweledig. Today, Tadcu is on hand to tell a silly story about invisible fish.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae Siarlys a Sam wedi mynd i ffwrdd am benwythnos dawel i Ynys Pontypandy, ond dyw'r profiad ddim mor "dawel" a hynny. Sam and Siarlys go away for a quiet weekend to Pontypandy Island.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae'r gadwyn wedi torri ar feic Harri - lwcus mai i weithdy trwsio beics mae o'n mynd heddiw. The chain on Harri's bike has broken - lucky that he is going to a bike repair workshop today.

programme.title: Bwystfil
programme.desc: Mae dannedd miniog a genau cryf o fantais mawr yn y gwyllt! Wythnos yma, rydyn ni'n cael cip olwg ar ddeg anifail snaplyd. This week, we're taking a look at 10 of the snappiest beasts.

programme.title: New: Mwy o Stwnsh Sadwrn
programme.desc: Cipolwg yn ôl dros rai o uchafbwyntiau rhaglen dydd Sadwrn. Tune in to relive some of the highlights of Saturday's programme.

programme.title: LEGO ® Ffrindiau: Amdani Ferched!
programme.desc: Mae pump merch yn eu harddegau yn penderfynu ymuno da'i gilydd er mwyn achub eu hannwyl Ddinas Calon Lan. The girls form a super-doer group to protect and serve their beloved Heartlake.

programme.title: New: Y Smyrffs
programme.desc: Mae Llipryn yn herio Horwth i brawf cryfder ac yn ennill ar ddamwain! Wimpy challenges Hefty to a test of strength and wins by accident!

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad: Kiwis Cymreig
programme.desc: Cwrddwn a Mark 'yr Hewl', a Josie Gritten - ill dau wedi gadael Cymru a chodi pac am Seland Newydd gan drawsnewid eu ffordd o fyw. We meet two Welsh migrants who've settled in New Zealand.

programme.desc: Mae'n rhaid i Rhys gadw cyfrinach rhag o pwyllgor y carnival, ond a fydd yn llwyddo i gadw ei geg ar gau? Mathew gives an unwelcome visitor the cold shoulder.

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Yn dilyn sioc mawr, mae Anna'n diodde'n arw ac yn ceisio penderfynu sut i ymdopi efo sefyllfa Miles. Lowri receives more bad news at the hospital, with the possibility of further surgery.

programme.desc: Stori ryfeddol arbrawf mwya'r byd yn CERN, lle mae ffisegwyr o Gymru yn allweddol. The remarkable story of the biggest physics experiment in the world, where Welsh scientists are key.

programme.title: Y Byd ar Bedwar
programme.desc: Teithiwn i Belfast ac Ynys Môn i ddeall yr ystadegau am yr ieithoedd Celtaidd: A yw'r Gymraeg yn llithro o afael ei chadarnleoedd? A look at the statistics for the Irish and Welsh languages.

programme.title: The Bank Shot
programme.desc: 1974. Comedy. Directed by Gower Champion. Stars George C. Scott, Joanna Cassidy & Sorrell Booke. A criminal mastermind plans to rob a Los Angeles bank that's temporarily located in a mobile home. [S]

programme.title: Lifetime Of Comedy
programme.desc: 1960. Compilation of comedy sketches from the comedy kings Buster Keaton, Charlie Chaplin, Danny Kaye & Bing Crosby. [S]

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: The Smiling Loser. 1959. Stars Rory Calhoun & Eddie Quillan. A cardsharp who cleaned out two men in poker is set up as the fall guy for an ambush on Bill, and steal the payroll he's delivering. [S]

programme.title: The Larkins
programme.desc: Minders Keepers. 1964. Stars Peggy Mount, Hugh Paddick & Derry Power. Ada gives the Major an ultimatum after his cousin writes to her and a frustrated Alf finds his home full of ticking clocks. [S]

programme.title: Open All Night
programme.desc: Drama. 1934. Director: George Pearson. Stars: Leslie Perrins, Frank Vosper. Anton is an exiled Russian grand-duke but works as a night manager in a hotel with tragic consequences. [S]

programme.title: Night Of The Prowler
programme.desc: 1962. Crime Drama. Directed by Francis Searle. When the director of a successful racing company is shot dead, the other directors wonder who is next. Starring Bill Nagy & Patrick Holt. [S]

programme.title: Clash By Night
programme.desc: 1963. Drama. Directed by Montgomery Tully. Starring Terence Longdon, Jennifer Jayne & Harry Fowler. A prison bus enroute to jail is hijacked by a gang determined to free their leader. [S]

programme.title: Colonel March Investigates
programme.desc: 1953. Crime drama starring Boris Karloff, Joan Sims and Richard Wattis. Colonel March runs the Scotland Yard office for the Department of Queer Complaints and investigates 3 strange crimes. [S]

programme.title: Paratrooper
programme.desc: 1954. War. Director: Terence Young. Stars Leo Genn, Alan Ladd & Harry Andrews. Distraught over his role in a tragic training accident, a US Air Force officer secretly enlists in the British Army. [S]

programme.title: The Happiness of Three Women
programme.desc: 1954. Comedy. Director: Maurice Elvey. Stars Petula Clark, Donald Houston & Brenda de Banzie. Story of a Welsh postman's efforts to bring happiness into the lives of an assortment of people. [S]

programme.title: The Big Trees
programme.desc: 1952. Western. Directed by Felix E. Feist. Stars Kirk Douglas, Eve Miller & Patrice Wymore. A timber baron sets his sights on California's redwood trees but faces conflict with a Quaker colony. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Lafe Returns. 1964. Stars Buddy Ebsen, Peter Whitney & Bobs Watson. Still trying to get his hands on the Clampett millions, Lafe pays a return visit to try to find where Jed has buried his money. [S]

programme.title: Scotland Yard
programme.desc: 1957. The Lonely House. Directed by Montgomery Tully. Starring Russell Napier, Dorothy Bramhall and Bettina Dickson. A trap is laid for a couple running a murderous dating agency. (S1, E19)

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The Fear Merchants. 1960. Stars Michael Landon, Lorne Greene & Victor Sen Yung. The Cartwrights come to the aid of a stable hand accused of murder and are opposed by a devious mayoral candidate. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: House Building/Trout & Grayling. 1986. In two more archive films of country life, Jack Hargreaves illustrates the ancient techniques of house building and the intricacies of dry fly fishing. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: We head to the English Riviera in the 40s, there's an incredible lost reel of The Tufty Club, we're off to 1940s Islington for tips on staying safe on the roads and do you remember Bile Beans? [S]

programme.title: Public Eye
programme.desc: 1973. The Trouble with Jenny. Stars Alfred Burke, Donald Houston & Petra Markham. In a dingy hotel, the strange activities of a young female guest come to Marker's attention. [S]

programme.title: The Key
programme.desc: 1958. War. Director: Carol Reed. Stars William Holden, Sophia Loren, Trevor Howard. A tugboat captain working off the coast of England finds comfort in the arms of the caring and beautiful Stella. [S]

programme.title: The Magic Sword
programme.desc: 1962. Adventure. Directed by Bert I. Gordon. Stars Basil Rathbone, Estelle Winwood & Gary Lockwood. Sir George, a young knight, sets out to rescue the woman he loves from the evil wizard Lodac. [S]

programme.title: The Magic Sword
programme.desc: 1962. Adventure. Directed by Bert I. Gordon. Stars Basil Rathbone, Estelle Winwood & Gary Lockwood. Sir George, a young knight, sets out to rescue the woman he loves from the evil wizard Lodac. [S]

programme.title: The Ebb Tide
programme.desc: 1997. Adventure. Director: Nicholas Renton. Stars Robbie Coltrane & Chris Barnes. Three hapless adventurers agree to sail a ship to Australia with a secret cargo, but soon enough disaster strikes. [S]

programme.title: Second Best Bed
programme.desc: 1938. Comedy. Directed by Tom Walls. Stars Jane Baxter, Tom Walls, Veronica Rose & Carl Jaffe. A newly married couple run into difficulty when the wife refuses to obey her husband. [S]

programme.title: Prisoners of the Tower

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: The Man Who Lied. 1955. Stars Hugh O'Brian, Rick Vallin & House Peters Jr. A man bent on revenge pays a gunman $1,000 to kill Wyatt Earp, with the gunman claiming that he has faced Earp before. [S]

programme.title: Undercover Agent
programme.desc: 1953. Crime Drama. An auditor (Dermot Walsh) is caught up in a murder and espionage whilst visiting a company. Starring Hazel Court. [S]

programme.title: Meet Mr Callaghan
programme.desc: 1954. Crime drama directed by Charles Saunders. Private detective Slim Callaghan (Derrick De Marney) is hired to find out why a rich uncle changed his will. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed at the end of June and beginning of July. [S]

programme.title: The Way Out
programme.desc: 1955. Crime. Director Montgomery Tully. Stars Gene Nelson, Mona Freeman & John Bentley. A man tells his wife he is being framed for murder, but the more she helps the more holes she finds. [S]

programme.title: The Battleaxe
programme.desc: 1962. Comedy. Directed by Godfrey Grayson. Stars Jill Ireland & Francis Matthews. A couple's pre-marital bliss is ruined by the bride's mother, leading the husband to be to make a bold decision. [S]

programme.title: Love is a Ball
programme.desc: 1963. Comedy. Director: David Swift. Stars Glenn Ford, Hope Lange & Charles Boyer. On the French Riviera, a matchmaker attempts to pair a poor duke and a wealthy heiress, but will all go to plan? [S]

programme.title: Devil's Bait
programme.desc: 1959. Drama. Director: Peter Graham Scott. Stars Geoffey Keen, Jane Hylton & Gordon Jackson. An incompetent rat-catcher leaves behind the poison he has used to eradicate rats from a small bakery. [S]

programme.title: Broken Journey
programme.desc: 1948. Drama. Directors: Ken Annakin & Michael C Chorlton. Stars Phyllis Calvert, James Donald & David Tomlinson. A plane crash lands miles from civilisation. The passengers must prevail. [S]

programme.title: The Edgar Wallace Mystery Theatre

programme.title: Batman

programme.title: Dial 999

programme.title: Train of Events

programme.desc: The Plant: As Molang and Piu Piu are preparing a potion to cure the king's mosquito bites, they discover an adorable plant... that's also a carnivore. (S5 Ep11)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Tooth Fairy: Pamela lost a tooth, but the Tooth Fairy didn't visit her. The MiniWhats are outraged, so they set off in pursuit of the evil Tooth Fairy. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: At The Foot Of The Rainbow: Petula and Pamela set off on a magic pony in search of the treasure buried at the foot of the rainbow. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: Little Yellow Riding Hood: Petula hasn't written her story for school, and it's due tomorrow. Ollie draws an old storybook and out pops Little Yellow Riding Hood, also known as Micheline. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Generous Genie: Mustard's skateboard was confiscated after he crossed the street without looking. Cars are so lame... If only one could fly over them! Ollie draws a magic lamp. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Mysterious Egyptian Pyramid: Mixo has decided to learn hieroglyphics, but if he really wants to do that, he needs to see the real thing, in Egypt. (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Jane's Perfect Present: After the Jr Ranchers spend all their time trying to prepare a special surprise birthday gift for Jane, they find out what she wanted was to spend the day with them. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Cruel Passion
programme.desc: A young orphan girl Justine falls into a world of cruel depravity while her sister Juliette thrives in vice. Adaptation of de Sade's novel. Contains distressing scenes and nudity.

programme.desc: Tongue-in-cheek Barbarella-style sci-fi caper. Amazonian space women invade Earth in search of a male to propagate their species. Contains nudity and 70s social attitudes.

programme.desc: Alice explores the flourishing world of sex and wellness, from a full-body orgasm workshop to an intimate yoni massage . Contains scenes of a sexual nature, nudity and strong language.
